User Documentation

Host developers API

Several distinct public API were provided to host developers:

  • CM Type Definitions
    Definition of several types (error, ...) shared by each APIs.
  • NMF Macros (ANSI C99)
    These macros (ANSI C99 compliant) are provided to ease FromHost interface call and ToHost interface callback declaration.
  • CM Components API
    This API allows the construction of a component network.
  • CM API for using interface in C
    This API allows to communicate in C with components network from the host core (which don't use the same programming model!).
  • CM API for using interface in C++
    This API allows to communicate in C++ with components network from the host core (which don't use the same programming model!).
  • CM Components Network Introspection API
    This API allows a user to dynamically introspect a component network.
  • CM Domain API
    This API allows a user to create and manage memory domains.
  • CM Memories API
    This API allows a user to allocate system memory visible or not from an MPC.
  • CM Monitoring API
    This API allows a user to monitor MPC load.
  • CM Proxy Configuration API
    This API allows a user to configure the Component Manager during the run-time.
Attention:
All public Component Manager API return t_cm_error type. The exceptions section in each method documentation describes t_cm_error value that can be returned.
